content: with a slip_stitch at the beginning of the row granny square april flower nono green row 6 start the row with 3 chain as a double_crochet work a double_crochet in each st of the last row at the croners of the square work in the space created by the 3 chain st 2 double_crochet + 2 chain + 2 double_crochet in the same space repeat until the end of the row finish the row with a slip_stitch at the beginning of the row
